Text: I have "COMMENT FAIRE L'AMOUR AVEC UN NÈGRE SANS SA FATIGUER", but... On VHS!
titestef - Does it have subtitles and are you able to convert it?  I saw it years ago at a Norwegian film club, and would love to see it again.
unfortunately... no (without subtitles and impossible for me to make a custom dvd), sorry
titestef - Are you able to put the movie in difital format, at least?  I am well aware that making subtitles from scratch is a pain in the butt.

could you please reseed GOD'S COUNTRY??
